00031 struct eqstr
00032 {
00037   bool operator()(const char* s1, const char* s2) const {
00038     return strcmp(s1, s2) == 0;
00039   }
00040 }; //end struct eqstr
00041 
00046 struct eqint
00047 {
00052   bool operator()(int i1, int i2) const {
00053     return i1 == i2;
00054   }
00055 }; //end struct eqint
00056 
00061 template<class PAT>
00062 struct less_than
00063 {
00064    bool operator() (const PAT* p1, const PAT* p2) const {
00065      return (*p1 < *p2);
00066    }
00067 };
